sentences.en: Both Scotland and Northern Ireland had made last-minute substitutions.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队和北爱尔兰队都在最后时刻做了换人调整。

sentences.en: Deer hunting was banned in Scotland in 1959.
sentences.cn: 猎鹿于1959年在苏格兰被禁止。

sentences.en: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.en: Ferries are a lifeline to the far-flung corners of Scotland.
sentences.cn: 渡船是苏格兰边远地区的生命线。

sentences.en: Frik Burger will officiate when the Pumas play Scotland.
sentences.cn: 弗里克·伯格将担任阿根廷队对苏格兰队比赛的裁判。

sentences.en: He tried to stay a few months every year in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 他每年都会争取在苏格兰住几个月。

sentences.en: I got on the phone to Inspector Joplin at Scotland Yard.
sentences.cn: 我与伦敦警察厅的乔普林巡官通过电话了。

sentences.en: Scotland were ahead in their European championship qualifier in Iceland.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在冰岛举行的欧洲杯预选赛中处于领先位置。

sentences.en: Seacliff House is one of the most romantic ruins in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 海崖城堡是苏格兰最富有浪漫色彩的遗迹之一。

sentences.en: Similar arrangements apply to students who are ordinarily resident in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 类似的安排适用于长期居住在苏格兰的学生。

sentences.en: The 77,000-acre estate contains five of the highest peaks in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 7.7万英亩的私人土地上有5座苏格兰最高的山峰。

sentences.en: The investigation is being handled by Scotland Yard's anti-terrorist branch.
sentences.cn: 调查由伦敦警察厅反恐部门负责。

sentences.en: The third resonantly poetic language of Scotland this century is Gaelic.
sentences.cn: 盖尔语是本世纪苏格兰第三种富有诗意的语言。

sentences.en: This is almost the mirror image of the situation in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 这几乎就是苏格兰局势的翻版。

sentences.en: We're going to Scotland for our holidays.
Why should they not go on to Scotland, if that had been the case?
sentences.cn: 要是真象你所想的那样，那他们干吗不到苏格兰去呢？

sentences.en: Women have been ordained for many years in the Church of Scotland.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰长老会多年前就已开始任命女性担任圣职。

phrases.tran_cn: （苏格兰正式定为国教的）苏格兰长老会
n. 苏格兰场（伦敦警察厅）

trans.tran_cn: 苏格兰（英国的一部分，在大不列颠岛北部）
